Roller Skates with LED Lights: Incorporating LED lights into roller skates would make them more visible in low-light conditions, reducing the risk of accidents and improving safety for both the skater and others on the road.
Roller Skates with Customizable Wheels: Offering a variety of wheel sizes and hardness levels would allow skaters to customize their roller skates to suit their specific needs and preferences.

Roller Skates with Built-in Sensors: Incorporating sensors into roller skates could enable users to track their speed, distance, and other metrics in real-time, providing valuable feedback for improving their performance.
Roller Skates with Smart Technology: Adding sensors and technology to roller skates could make them more responsive to the user's movements, providing a more intuitive and seamless experience.
Roller Skates with Magnetic Braking System: A magnetic braking system would allow skaters to stop quickly and safely, reducing the risk of collisions and accidents.
